== Main Inclusion Report for Xfburn ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/x/xfburn, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:'xubuntu CD writing tool'

 0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.

 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Not in Debian
** Upstream took a break from maintenance until this summer but the app is stable otherwise.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://bugs.xfce.org]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 

** Standard cdbs packaging, standard patch system
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
